comment.author: 44911068@N03
comment._content: A guy who served with me in Viet Nam owns a Hotel and Golf Golf Resort that fronts that road in Adare for about a mile.   Its called "The Adare Manor ".  Anybody ever heard of it ???  Hey look, I'm not going to Drop Any Names, here !!!

comment.author: 30369211@N00
comment._content: Streetview shows the same school building still stands on the right. It looks as though there is a date over the door, but I can't read it in Streetview, dammit! According to the local area plan (a pdf), this was originally a fever hospital, converted to a school in 1830, so no help for dating this photo.
